title: Peanut butter buns
ingredients: ['175g (6 oz) golden caster sugar', '175g (6 oz) Stork® baking spread', '175g (6 oz) self raising flour', '3 medium eggs', '3 tablespoons cocoa powder (if making chocolate)', '2 tablespoons milk', '3 tablespoons smooth peanut butter', 'Buttercream', '280g (10 oz) icing sugar', '110g (4 oz) Stork® baking spread', '3 tablespoons smooth peanut butter', '2 tablespoons Carnation® caramel']
